the 33: Title: the 33 Actors: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, Juliette Binoche Director: Patricia Riggen Gneres: Biography, Drama, History Description: Based on the real-life event, when a gold and copper mine collapses, it traps 33 miners underground for 69 days.
loose change: Title: Loose Change Actors: Dylan Avery, Marcel Bernard, Director:  Gneres: Documentary, Description: What if...September 11th was not a surprise attack on America, but rather, a cold and calculated genocide by our own government?We were told that the twin towers were hit by commercial jetliners and subsequently brought down by jet fuel. We were told that the Pentagon was hit by a Boeing 757. We were told that flight 93 crashed in Shanksville, Pennsylvania. We were told that nineteen Arabs from halfway across the globe, acting under orders from Osama Bin Laden, were responsible. What you will see here will prove without a shadow of a doubt that everything you know about 9/11 is a complete fabrication. Conspiracy theory? It's not a theory if you can prove it.Written and narrated by Dylan Avery, this film presents a rebuttal to the official version of the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks and the 9/11 Commission Report.
call of the wild: Title: call of the wild Actors: Christopher Lloyd, Ariel Gade, Wes Studi Director: Richard Gabai Gneres: Adventure, Drama, Family Description: In Montana, a young girl attracts the attention of an evil stranger after she rescues a hurt wolf.
pacquiao: the movie: Title: pacquiao: the movie Actors: Jericho Rosales, Bea Alonzo, Bayani Agbayani Director:  Gneres: Drama, Action, Description: Jericho Rosales portrays Filipino boxer Manny Pacquiao as he struggles out of poverty to become a champion and national hero. Yet when the pressures of his sport, his personal life and the high expectations of his countrymen take their toll, he falls from grace. With the help of his wife (Bea Alonzo), will he be able to rise once more to be worthy of being called "the People's Champion"?
ring 2: Title: ring 2 Actors: Miki Nakatani, Hitomi Sato, Kyoko Fukada Director:  Gneres: Horror, Mystery, Science Fiction, Description: While investigating the horrifying death of her boyfriend, Mai Takano learns about a videotape haunted by the spirit of a disturbing girl named Sadako, which kills anyone who watches it exactly one week later. When her boyfriend’s son, Yoichi, starts to develop the same psychic abilities as Sadako, Takano must find a way to keep the boy and herself from becoming the next victims.
explorers: Title: explorers Actors: Ethan Hawke, River Phoenix, Jason Presson Director: Joe Dante Gneres: Adventure, Comedy, Family Description: A boy obsessed with 50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?
freedom writers: Title: freedom writers Actors: Hilary Swank, Patrick Dempsey, Scott Glenn Director: Richard LaGravenese Gneres: Biography, Crime, Drama Description: A young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves and pursue education beyond high school.
deliverance: Title: deliverance Actors: Jon Voight, Burt Reynolds, Ned Beatty Director: John Boorman Gneres: Adventure, Drama, Thriller Description: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.
radio days: Title: radio days Actors: Mike Starr, Paul Herman, Don Pardo Director: Woody Allen Gneres: Comedy Description: A nostalgic look at radio's golden age focusing on one ordinary family and the various performers in the medium.
w.w. and the dixie dancekings: Title: w.w. and the dixie dancekings Actors: Burt Reynolds, Conny Van Dyke, Jerry Reed Director: John G. Avildsen Gneres: Comedy Description: W. Bright (Burt Reynolds) is a robber with a heart of gold who travels the South knocking off banks and gas stations owned by a corrupt businessman. When he hijacks a car, he meets an aspiring country band, the Dixie Dancekings, led by Dixie (Conny Van Dyke). The two sides eventually take a liking to one another, especially after the Dancekings realize the size of Bright's thefts. Trailed by ...
battle of the bulge: Title: battle of the bulge Actors: Henry Fonda, Robert Shaw, Robert Ryan Director: Ken Annakin Gneres: Drama, History, War Description: A dramatization of Nazi Germany's final Western Front counterattack of World War II.
men at work: Title: men at work Actors: Charlie Sheen, Emilio Estevez, Leslie Hope Director: Emilio Estevez Gneres: Action, Comedy, Crime Description: Two garbage men uncover a conspiracy involving illegal toxic waste dumping and decide to bring the whole operation down.
night school: Title: night school Actors: Kevin Hart, Tiffany Haddish, Rob Riggle Director: Malcolm D. Lee Gneres: Comedy Description: A group of high school dropouts are forced to attend night school in hope that they'll pass the GED exam to finish high school.
the creeper: Title: the creeper Actors: Eduardo Ciannelli, Onslow Stevens, June Vincent Director: Jean Yarbrough Gneres: Adventure, Horror Description: A man is turned into a "catlike" killer by means of a serum invented by a crazed scientist.
dirty wars: Title: dirty wars Actors:  Director:  Gneres: Documentary, Drama, War, Crime, Mystery Description: Investigative journalist, Jeremy Scahill is pulled into an unexpected journey as he chases down the hidden truth behind America's expanding covert wars, and examines how the US government has responded to international terrorist threats in ways that seem to go against the established laws of the land.
the tillman story: Title: the tillman story Actors:  Director:  Gneres: Documentary Description: Pat Tillman never thought of himself as a hero. His choice to leave a multimillion-dollar football contract and join the military wasn't done for any reason other than he felt it was the right thing to do. The fact that the military manipulated his tragic death in the line of duty into a propaganda tool is unfathomable and thoroughly explored in Amir Bar-Lev's riveting and enraging documentary.
the kill team: Title: the kill team Actors:  Director:  Gneres: War, Documentary Description: In 2010, the media branded a platoon of U.S. Army infantry soldiers “The Kill Team” following reports of its killing for sport in Afghanistan. Now, one of the accused must fight the government he defended on the battlefield, while grappling with his own role in the alleged murders. Dan Krauss’s absorbing documentary examines the stories of four men implicated in heinous war crimes in a stark reminder that, in war, innocence may be relative to the insanity around you.
waist deep: Title: waist deep Actors: Tyrese Gibson, Shawn Parr, Henry Hunter Hall Director: Vondie Curtis-Hall Gneres: Action, Crime, Drama Description: An ex-convict (Tyrese) gets tangled up with a gang after his car is hijacked with his son inside.
funny people: Title: funny people Actors: Adam Sandler, Seth Rogen, Leslie Mann Director: Judd Apatow Gneres: Comedy, Drama Description: When seasoned comedian George Simmons learns of his terminal, inoperable health condition, his desire to form a genuine friendship causes him to take a relatively green performer under his wing as his opening act.
chisum: Title: chisum Actors: John Wayne, Forrest Tucker, Christopher George Director: Andrew V. McLaglen Gneres: Biography, Western Description: Cattle baron John Chisum joins forces with Billy the Kid and Pat Garrett to fight the Lincoln County land war.
appaloosa: Title: appaloosa Actors: Robert Jauregui, Jeremy Irons, Timothy V. Murphy Director: Ed Harris Gneres: Action, Crime, Drama Description: Two friends hired to police a small town that is suffering under the rule of a rancher find their job complicated by the arrival of a young widow.
popeye: Title: popeye Actors: Robin Williams, Shelley Duvall, Ray Walston Director: Robert Altman Gneres: Adventure, Comedy, Family Description: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.
conception: Title: conception Actors: Pamela Adlon, David Arquette, Aaron Ashmore Director: Josh Stolberg Gneres: Comedy, Romance Description: A comedy that follows nine very different couples on the night they conceive, showing that sex can sometimes be more neurotic than erotic.
hunter: Title: hunter Actors: Ron Becks, Kristine DeBell, George Lazenby Director: Gregory Hatanaka Gneres: Action, Drama Description: Lt. Ramsey Hunter's life changes when 3 cases hit him simultaneously. A rogue Cop Killer, a beautiful Tennessee runaway serial killer and his corrupt Police Captain boss blackmailing him. ...
manhunt: Title: manhunt Actors: Dan Gregory, Franklin Correa, Director:  Gneres: Action, Thriller, Description: A martial artist/ survivalist must play a game of cat-and-mouse with a maniacal sadistic Man by the name of Santos and survive against five killers in order to save his life as well as his girlfriends
wilson: Title: wilson Actors: Woody Harrelson, Sandra Lee-Oian Thomas, Shaun J. Brown Director: Craig Johnson Gneres: Comedy, Drama Description: A lonely, neurotic, and hilariously honest middle-aged man reunites with his estranged wife, and meets his teenage daughter for the first time.
he knows you're alone: Title: he knows you're alone Actors: Don Scardino, Caitlin O'Heaney, Elizabeth Kemp Director: Armand Mastroianni Gneres: Horror, Thriller Description: A young bride-to-be is being stalked upon by a serial killer in Staten Island. She gets help from a former lover, but will they manage to escape?
the wizard: Title: the wizard Actors: Luke Edwards, Vince Trankina, Wendy Phillips Director: Todd Holland Gneres: Adventure, Comedy, Drama Description: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross country with the help of a girl they meet to compete in the ultimate video game championship.
immortal combat: Title: immortal combat Actors: Shin'ichi Chiba, Roddy Piper, Meg Foster Director: Dan Neira Gneres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Description: Rowdy Roddy Piper and Sonny Chiba battle an army of immortal ninja warriors.
full metal village: Title: full metal village Actors: Uwe Trede, Lore Trede, Klaus H. Plähn Director:  Gneres: Documentary, Description: The film describes the microcosmos of the small village Wacken and shows the clash of the cultures, before and during the biggest heavy metal festival in Europe.
keeping the faith: Title: keeping the faith Actors: Ben Stiller, Edward Norton, Jenna Elfman Director: Edward Norton Gneres: Comedy, Drama, Romance Description: Two friends, a priest and a rabbi, fall in love with the same woman they knew in their youth, but the religious position of both men denies them romance.
amusement: Title: amusement Actors: Keir O'Donnell, Katheryn Winnick, Laura Breckenridge Director: John Simpson Gneres: Action, Comedy, Crime Description: Three women are stalked by a killer with a grudge that extends back to the girls' childhoods.
death of a ghost hunter: Title: death of a ghost hunter Actors: Patti Tindall, Mike Marsh, Davina Joy Director: Sean Tretta Gneres: Horror, Thriller Description: Renowned "ghost hunter", Carter Simms is paid to conduct a paranormal investigation of a supposedly haunted house. Along with a cameraman, a reporter, and a spiritual advocate, she embarks on a three night journey into terror.
anna karenina: Title: anna karenina Actors: Matthew Macfadyen, Eric MacLennan, Kelly Macdonald Director: Joe Wright Gneres: Drama, Romance Description: In late-19th-century Russian high society, St. Petersburg aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the dashing Count Alexei Vronsky.
notes on a scandal: Title: notes on a scandal Actors: Judi Dench, Cate Blanchett, Tom Georgeson Director: Richard Eyre Gneres: Crime, Drama, Romance Description: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship.
malice: Title: malice Actors: Alec Baldwin, Nicole Kidman, Bill Pullman Director: Harold Becker Gneres: Crime, Mystery, Thriller Description: A tale about a happily married couple who would like to have children. Tracy teaches art, Andy's a college dean. Things are never the same after she is taken to hospital and operated upon by Jed, a "know all" doctor.
singles: Title: singles Actors: Bridget Fonda, Campbell Scott, Kyra Sedgwick Director: Cameron Crowe Gneres: Comedy, Drama, Romance Description: A group of twenty-something friends most of whom live in the same apartment complex search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.
jury duty: Title: jury duty Actors:  Director:  Gneres: Comedy, Drama Description: When jobless Tommy Collins discovers that sequestered jurors earn free room and board as well as $5-a-day, he gets himself assigned to a jury in a murder trial. Once there, he does everything he can to prolong the trial and deliberations and make the sequestration more comfortable for himself.
twelve disciples of nelson mandela: Title: twelve disciples of nelson mandela Actors:  Director:  Gneres: Documentary, Description: Filmmaker Thomas Allen Harris focuses on the roles both his stepfather, Pule "Lee" Leinaeng, and the African National Congress played in bringing down apartheid from outside the confines of South Africa in this documentary that aims to strike a balance between intimate biography and searing social history. As the grip of apartheid was strengthening, a young group of concerned African National Congress activists exiled themselves to Botswana, Tanzania, and other "safe" locations outside of South Africa in hopes of battling oppression from the outside. By utilizing actors to create dramatic reenactments of events from that time, inter-cutting the newly shot footage with archival images, and tracing the path of his stepfather to the United States, Harris attempts to both personalize the plight of the ANC and simultaneously offer an in-depth account of the struggles the group faced while trying to abolish tyranny and restore justice to their homeland.
life as a house: Title: life as a house Actors: Kevin Kline, Kristin Scott Thomas, Hayden Christensen Director: Irwin Winkler Gneres: Drama Description: When a man is diagnosed with terminal cancer, he takes custody of his misanthropic teenage son, for whom quality time means getting high, engaging in small-time prostitution, and avoiding his father.
high noon: Title: high noon Actors: Gary Cooper, Thomas Mitchell, Lloyd Bridges Director: Fred Zinnemann Gneres: Drama, Thriller, Western Description: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon when the gang leader, an outlaw he sent up years ago, arrives on the noon train.
killer klowns from outer space: Title: killer klowns from outer space Actors: Grant Cramer, Suzanne Snyder, John Allen Nelson Director: Stephen Chiodo Gneres: Comedy, Horror, Sci-Fi Description: Aliens who look like clowns come from outer space and terrorize a small town.
the hunt for the btk killer: Title: the hunt for the btk killer Actors:  Director:  Gneres: TV Movie, Crime, Drama Description: After 31 years at-large, detectives in Wichita, Kansas hone in on the serial killer known as BTK.
my life as a dog: Title: my life as a dog Actors: Anton Glanzelius, Tomas von Brömssen, Anki Lidén Director:  Gneres: Drama, Comedy, Description: A boy, obsessed with comparing himself with those less fortunate, experiences a different life at the home of his aunt and uncle in 1959 Sweden.
the last full measure: Title: the last full measure Actors: Sebastian Stan, Alison Sudol, Asher Miles Fallica Director: Todd Robinson Gneres: Drama, War Description: Thirty-four years after his death, Airman William H. Pitsenbarger, Jr. ("Pits") is awarded the nation's highest military honor, for his actions on the battlefield.
manhunt: the search for bin laden: Title: manhunt: the search for bin laden Actors:  Director:  Gneres: Documentary, Description: An espionage tale from inside the CIA's long conflict against Al Qaeda, as revealed by the remarkable women and men whose secret war against Osama bin Laden started nearly a decade before most of us even knew his name.

With the help of some real farmers, oodles of fertilizer and government aide, and some genetically modified seeds, the friends manage to grow one acre of corn. Title: poverty inc. Actors: Michael Parenti, Director:  Gneres: Documentary, Description: Poverty, Inc. explores the hidden side of doing good. In order to do this, Claudinei routinely visits the downtown neighborhood of Santa Efigênia in his lime-green VW bus. This film shows us the intimate workings of that universe in an effort to stimulate recycling and to expose these individuals as followers of a noble and respectable way of life.

dancemaker: Title: dancemaker Actors:  Director:  Gneres: Documentary, Description: A look at Paul Taylor and his dance company over several months in 1997. Preparation of Taylor's piece, "Piazzolla Caldera," from conception and rehearsals to opening night at City Center, frames the film. The troupe's trip to India falls in the middle. Included are black and white footage of rehearsals, and, in color, interviews with Taylor, his dancers, dance critics and scholars, and those who manage the business side. There is also footage of a younger Taylor dancing and film of the troupe performing a dozen Taylor pieces. His genius, his roots, his method of working with dancers, and his sometimes difficult nature draw the attention of those who comment.

A long way off from the front-line, at some God-forgotten junction, the Germans make an air landing operation in an attempt to get through to the Kirov railway and the White Sea - the Baltic Sea Canal. Baptista declares that he won't give Bianca away in a marriage until he's found a husband for Kate, so all the suitors begin busily hunting out a madman who's willing to do it, and they find Petruchio: a man who's come to wive it wealthily in Padua. cleopatra: Title: cleopatra Actors:  Director:  Gneres: Drama, History, Romance, TV Movie Description: Cleopatra, the famed Egyptian Queen born in 69 B.C., is shown to have been brought by Roman ruler Julius Caesar at age 18. Caesar becomes sexually obsessed by the 18 year old queen, beds her, and eventually has a son by her. However, his Roman followers and his wife are not pleased by the union. In fact, as Caesar has only a daughter by his wife, he had picked Octavian as his successor. The out-of-wedlock son of Cleopatra is seen to be a threat to his future leadership. Thus Brutus and other Roman legislators plot the assassination of Caesar. Caesar's loyal general, Marc Antony, and Octavian then divide up the Roman empire. Antony takes Egypt and soon takes up the affair with Cleopatra. However, Octavian soon launches an attack on Antony and ultimately defeats and mortally wounds him. Rather than permitting herself to be humiliated by Octavian, Cleopatra sends her son away to India and she commits suicide by permitting the deadly asp to bite her.

Much of the documentary footage was captured by Swedish mountaineer Fredrik Sträng. Sträng was planning to do a Documentary which was aborted due to the fact that he did not reach the summit. making a murderer: Title: Making a Murderer  Actors: Steven Avery, Brendan Dassey, and Michael O'Kelly  Director: Laura Ricciardi and Moira Demos  Genres: Documentary, Crime, Drama  Overview: Making a Murderer is a 2015 American documentary television series directed by Laura Ricciardi and Moira Demos. The series follows the case of Steven Avery, a man who served 18 years in prison for a crime he did not commit, and his subsequent wrongful conviction for the murder of Teresa Halbach. The series explores the complex legal issues surrounding Avery's case, as well as the personal and emotional toll it takes on him and his family. The series also features interviews with Avery's family, friends, and legal team, as well as footage of Avery's trial and the investigation into his case. Making a Murderer is a gripping and thought-provoking series that raises important questions about the criminal justice system and the impact it can have on individuals and their families.
s: Title: The Shawshank Redemption  Actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler  Director: Frank Darabont  Genres: Drama, Crime, Drama  Overview: The Shawshank Redemption is a powerful and moving film that tells the story of Andy Dufresne (Tim Robbins), a banker who is wrongly convicted of murder and sentenced to life at the notorious Shawshank State Penitentiary. There, he forms an unlikely friendship with fellow inmate, Red (Morgan Freeman), and together they navigate the harsh realities of prison life. Through their struggles and triumphs, they learn the true meaning of friendship, hope, and redemption. The Shawshank Redemption is a timeless classic that remains one of the most beloved and inspiring films of all time.

Wind in the Willows (1988): Title: Wind in the Willows (1988)  Actors: David Jason, Nicol Williamson, Peter Sellers, and Terry-Thomas  Director: Terry Jones  Genres: Adventure, Animation, Comedy, Family, Fantasy  Overview: Wind in the Willows is a 1988 animated film adaptation of the 1908 novel of the same name by Kenneth Grahame. The film follows the adventures of four anthropomorphic animals - Rat, Mole, Badger, and Toad - as they navigate the countryside and encounter various challenges and obstacles.
